CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, I'd like to have them to sell at our concerts,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When a dog rolls over to show its belly,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, that's right.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: At least when I heard her at school before,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: even I could tell as a novice that she's really good.

前のは まぐれだったのかしら?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Growth?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: For practicing with me.

CONTENT: あっ い... いえ

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, w-well, actually...

CONTENT: は... はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right.

CONTENT: 私 そのときに心から"頑張った" って言えるように　後悔しないようにしたくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quiero trabajar muy duro para no arrepentirme sobre el escenario.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When the time comes, I want to be able to say I gave it my all, and that I don't have any regrets.

CONTENT: だから オーディションの日まで おつきあい よろしくお願いします
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Así que acompáñame hasta el día de la audición.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So please stick with me until the day of the audition!

CONTENT: そ... そんな 頭 上げて　こ... こちらこそ よろしくお願いします
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Levanta la cabeza! Vamos a hacer esto juntas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: P-Please don't bow! I-I'm the one who's h-happy to be here!

CONTENT: えっ 何 その髪型
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's with the hair?

CONTENT: 何やってんの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What are we doing?

CONTENT: バ... バンドマンとしての成長を　見た目で表現... だそうです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: "V-Visually showing our growth as a band"... Apparently.

CONTENT: やっぱり リョウか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: More of Ryo's mischief?

CONTENT: 飲酒 喫煙 女遊び　そして 髪型を きのこヘア
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Alcohol, tabaco, mujeres y corte de hongo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Drinking, smoking, dalliances with women, and the mop-top hairstyle...

CONTENT: それがバンドマン　イメージがコテコテすぎる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Así son los músicos. -¡Lo estás exagerando!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It all equals "band." You're laying it on a little thick!

CONTENT: それに たばこも お酒も 二十歳になってから!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y nada de beber y fumar antes de los veinte.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And no smoking or drinking until you're twenty!

CONTENT: はい きのこー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Everyone say, "mop-top"!

CONTENT: 虹夏
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nijika.

CONTENT: んー 満足した?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotten it out of your system?

CONTENT: 虹夏には 目が半分隠れて うざったい感じの　斜め前髪枠が空いてるから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A ti te queda mejor el peinado malote con flequillo que te tapa un ojo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We've got an opening for "uneven bangs that hide one eye and a perpetually annoyed expression."

CONTENT: そんな枠 結構です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll pass, thanks.

CONTENT: あっ あのー ん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: U-Um...

CONTENT: あっ あ... 私 女遊び無理です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Veo difícil lo de salir con mujeres.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I c-can't have dalliances with women.

CONTENT: 私と遊んでくれる女の人がいません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I d-don't think any women would want to dally with me...

CONTENT: 大丈夫 下北沢のビレバン前で　ギターを背負って けだるそうにしとけば　多分 誰か寄ってくるから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tranquila. Si te pones delante de donde hay panfletos con la guitarra, se te acercarán.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't worry. Stand in front of VillePan in Shimo-Kitazawa, wearing your guitar and looking listless, and someone'll come up to you sooner or later.

CONTENT: こらこら　偏見に満ちた情報 教えない! 真面目にやる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No le des información repleta de prejuicios. Tómatelo en serio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Cut it out! Stop misinforming her with your subjective experience! Let's do it right!

CONTENT: でも 成長って目に見えないし 判断基準 ぼんやりしてるし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero el progreso es algo subjetivo. No es algo que se note a simple vista.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But growth isn't always visible. And the criteria is quite vague.

CONTENT: ううん はっきりしてるよ　とにかく お姉ちゃんを 納得させればいいんだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No. Sí que se nota. Y solo hay que convencer a Seika.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, it's very clear! We just need to convince Sis to take us on!

CONTENT: 練習あるのみ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Practice is the only way!

CONTENT: ほーら さっさと着替えて! 喜多ちゃんも　あっ はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now, get changed! You too, Kita-chan! R-Right!

CONTENT: リョウさんの 言うことも ちょっと分かる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo que dice Ryo tiene sentido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think I get what Ryo-san's saying, though.

CONTENT: 成長って 正直なところ よく分からない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No sé cómo se puede ver si has progresado o no.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's hard to know exactly what "growth" means.

CONTENT: イタッ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ow!

CONTENT: 努力とは また違う気もする
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No creo que equivalga al esfuerzo dedicado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't think it's quite the same as effort put in.

CONTENT: ここ最近 本当に激動だった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estos días han sido una montaña rusa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My life as of late has been a whirlwind.

CONTENT: バイトを始めた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I started working.

CONTENT: 人の目が たまに見れるようになった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A veces puedo mirar a la gente a los ojos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've gained the ability to occasionally look others in the eye.

CONTENT: 指 良くなったねえ だいぶ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Your finger's looking better.

CONTENT: でも それは　バンドとしての 成長ではない気がする
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero eso no es progresar como parte de la banda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I don't think that's the same thing as growing as a band.

CONTENT: ただ ミジンコやミドリムシから 人間としてのスタートラインに　やっと立っただけ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es pasar de ser una pulga o una euglena a intentar volverse un ser humano.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've just evolved past the water flea or euglena stage and now stand at the starting line of basic humanity.

CONTENT: せっかく夢だったバンドを やれてるのに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mi sueño era estar en una banda,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I thought finally starting the band I dreamed about

CONTENT: 成長した気になってただけで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: would be growth in itself, but...

CONTENT: 私は...
よし 今日は ここまでにしようか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay, let's call it a day.

CONTENT: えっ もうですか?　うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Already? Yeah.

CONTENT: 明日のオーディションに備えて ゆっくり休んでね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Descansen para la audición de mañana.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Get a good night's rest for the audition tomorrow.

CONTENT: お疲れ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: See you.

CONTENT: お疲れさまです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Great work, all!

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃーん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi-chan!

CONTENT: ごめんごめん 驚かせちゃって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry, sorry! Didn't mean to startle you.

CONTENT: あっ いえ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-It's okay.

CONTENT: コーラでいい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Cola, right?

CONTENT: えっ? あっ えええ... えっ あっ はい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wh-Wh-What? Yes?

CONTENT: はい　あっ ありがとうございます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Here! Th-Thank you.

CONTENT: もし あたしに つきあわせちゃったりしてたら　ごめんね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si te ves obligada a seguirme el ritmo, lo siento.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry if I forced you to go along with this.

CONTENT: いや ほら ぼっちちゃんが 結束バンド入ってくれたのって　その場の成り行きだったでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es que te uniste a Kessoku Band por inercia.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I mean, you kind of just got roped into joining Kessoku Band from the start, right?

CONTENT: はあ
ぼっちちゃん あのとき
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I remember you saying...

CONTENT: ずっとバンドやりたかった って言ってたけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: que siempre habías querido tocar en una banda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: you'd been wanting to be part of a band,

CONTENT: そういえば あたし　ぼっちちゃんが どんなバンドしたいとか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero en realidad nunca te he preguntado
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but I never actually asked you what kind of band you wanted to be in,

CONTENT: なんのために 今 バンドしてるとか　聞いたこと なかったなーって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: por qué tocas o qué clase de banda quieres.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: or what your reasons were for playing in this band now.

CONTENT: あっ いや...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, well...

CONTENT: ち... ちやほや されたくて始めたって　正直に言うべきだろうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Should I tell her I started because I wanted people going crazy for me?

CONTENT: 人によって そういうの それぞれじゃない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Everyone's got their own reasons, right?

CONTENT: 別に ライブに出るのが全てじゃないし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Dar conciertos no lo es todo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's not like performing live is the only way to go now.

CONTENT: 知ってもらうのも 今は配信とか 方法は いろいろだし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ahora puedes darte a conocer mediante transmisiones, por ejemplo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can always post videos and stuff nowadays if what you want is to get your sound out there.

CONTENT: 確かに
ギターヒーローで　ネット配信するのも 楽しいし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es divertido hacer transmisiones como guitarhero

CONTENT: ネットの世界は　私に合ってる事実も あったり...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y es cierto que es algo va bastante bien conmigo.

CONTENT: あたしはさ 目標っていうか 夢があるから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo tengo un objetivo, bueno, un sueño.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: See... I've got this kind of goal. A dream, really.

CONTENT: だから つい 熱くなり過ぎるっていうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quizás a veces me emociono demasiado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I can get a little fired up without realizing it.

CONTENT: だから ぼっちちゃんに　無理させちゃってたり するかなあとか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por eso me preocupaba estarte arrastrando.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So... I worry I might have dragged you into this against your will.

CONTENT: そっ そそそそ... そんな 全然　むむむ... 無理なんて ないです!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡No, no, para nada! No me fuerzas a nada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: N-N-Not at all! It's n-n-not against my will at all!

CONTENT: そう? なら よかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Really? That's good.

CONTENT: 虹夏ちゃんのバンドやる理由は　売れて武道館ライブですよね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quieres volverte popular y dar un concierto en el Budokan, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The reason you wanted a band... It's to get famous and perform at the Budokan, right?

CONTENT: 本当の夢は その先にあるんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mi verdadero sueño va aún más allá.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My real dream is actually a little past that.

CONTENT: でも まだ ぼっちちゃんには 秘密だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero de momento es un secreto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I can't tell you just yet!

CONTENT: じゃ 明日 よろしくねー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Anyway, see you tomorrow!

CONTENT: 私が今 バンドやってる理由
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I spent all night thinking about my reason

CONTENT: ひと晩 考えたけど...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: for playing in this band now.

CONTENT: 結束バンドです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're Kessoku Band.

CONTENT: じゃあ"ギターと孤独と蒼い惑星" って曲 やりまーす!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vamos a tocar "Guitarra, soledad y un planeta azul".
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're going to play our song, "Guitar, Solitude, and the Blue Planet"!

CONTENT: 今も 人気になって ちやほやされたいっていうのは　変わりない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aún quiero volverme popular y recibir atención.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I do still want to become popular and have everyone go crazy for me...

CONTENT: でも それは 私だけじゃない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero no lo quiero solo para mí,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But now... it's not just for me.

CONTENT: この4人でだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's the four of us!

CONTENT: 突然降る夕立 あぁ傘もないや嫌
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A sudden evening shower falls And yeah, it figures, I don't have an umbrella...

CONTENT: 空のご機嫌なんか知らない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Who cares how the sky's feeling, anyway?

CONTENT: 季節の変わり目の...　結局 成長って何か 分からなかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sigo sin saber qué es el progreso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When it's time for the seasons to change I never figured out what it means to have "growth." What are you supposed to wear? Who knows?

CONTENT: でも 今 私は　この4人で ちやほやされて バンドをし続けたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero ahora quiero que se fijen en nosotras y sigamos como banda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Spring and fall... yeah, where'd they go? But right now, what I want is to stay with this band and have people go crazy for us! The pressure of information, suffocating

CONTENT: 虹夏ちゃんの本当の夢も かなえてあげたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quiero cumplir el verdadero sueño de Nijika.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A spiral of vertigo I want to make Nijika-chan's actual dream come true. Don't know where I am

CONTENT: だから こんなオーディション なんかで落ちるわけにはいかない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Así que tenemos que pasar esta audición.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can hear myself breathing so loud, so loud... So... I can't afford to blow this audition!

CONTENT: このまま バンド終わらせたくない!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡No quiero que la banda acabe aún!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But why? I can't hear the sounds of the world... I don't want the band to end just yet!

CONTENT: 足りない 足りない 誰にも気づかれない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's not enough, not enough, No one knows I'm here

CONTENT: 殴り書きみたいな音 出せない状態で叫んだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I screamed when I couldn't make a scribble of a sound

CONTENT: 「ありのまま」なんて 誰に見せるんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Who am I supposed to show "just who I am" to?

CONTENT: 馬鹿なわたしは歌うだけ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I'm singing just like the fool I am

CONTENT: ぶちまけちゃおうか 星に
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's lay it all out to the stars!

CONTENT: ありがとうございました!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you for having us!

CONTENT: いいんじゃない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Pretty good.

CONTENT: って言いたいところだが
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Or so I'd like to say, but...

CONTENT: ドラム 肩に 力入れ過ぎ あっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Drums, you're too tense.

CONTENT: ギター2人 下向き過ぎ うっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Guitars, you're both looking down too much.

CONTENT: ベースは自分の世界に入り過ぎ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bass, you're too holed up in your own little world.

CONTENT: でも まあ お前らが どういうバンドかは分かったけどね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero sí me transmitieron qué tipo de banda son.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Still... I think I know what kind of band you are now.

CONTENT: アドバイス ありがとうございました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you... for the feedback.

CONTENT: えっ? 何 そのリアクション
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? What's with that reaction?

CONTENT: いや だって...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: W-Well... I mean...

CONTENT: だから どういうバンドか分かったってば
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya entendí el tipo de banda que son.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm saying, I learned what kind of band you are!

CONTENT: ここ 喜ぶところだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is the part where you cheer.

CONTENT: 多分 合格ってことだと思いますよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que intenta decir que aprobaron.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think she's saying you passed.

CONTENT: だから そう言ってんだろ 合格!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero si eso es lo que dije. Aprobaron.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's what I said! You passed!

CONTENT: もう お姉ちゃん 分かりにくすぎー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sis, you're so misleading!

CONTENT: えっ そ... ええ? つまり やったってこと?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-You mean... we did it?

CONTENT: やったー! ああっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We did it!

CONTENT: 合格ですって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She says we passed!

CONTENT: はい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes!

CONTENT: やったわね は... はい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We really did it? Yes!

CONTENT: リョウも気付いた? うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotoh-san, we did it!

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃんの演奏 少しの間だったけど　いつもと 全然違ったような...　後藤さん やっぱり すごかったわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Durante un momento, Bocchi tocó de forma distinta. Estuviste increíble, Goto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yes! Gotoh-san! Yes! You were really incredible there, Gotoh-san.

CONTENT: き... 喜多さん すいません!　ううっ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: E-Excuse me, Kita-san!

CONTENT: 後藤さん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotoh-san?

CONTENT: 後藤さーん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotoh-san?!

CONTENT: さっきの演奏　気のせいか...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Need a glass of water?

CONTENT: す... すみません　慣れないことしたから 胃酸が大量に...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo siento. Hacer algo nuevo me retuerce el estómago.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: S-Sorry. Too many new things at once put my stomach acid into overdrive...

CONTENT: 大丈夫 大丈夫 ハアー　そりゃ 胃腸もびっくりするよ

CONTENT: まさかの合格だったし

CONTENT: すっごーい さすが先輩!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Awesome! That's my senpai!

CONTENT: まあ 終わったあとなら なんとでも言えるよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, easy to say after it's done.

CONTENT: みんなで写真撮りましょ

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: C-Can't I clean the floor first?

CONTENT: やっぱり かなり うまいな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She really is good.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: that her lack of self-confidence holds her back.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She could grow even more.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Has the manager been making eye contact with me?

CONTENT: 自信を持ってもらうには
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: To give her confidence,

CONTENT: 自分を認めてくれる人間がいる って気付かせないと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: tiene que ver que alguien reconoce su talento.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: she needs to know someone out there acknowledges her talent.

CONTENT: えっ 見られてる? 怒ってる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's looking at me! Is she mad?!

CONTENT: さっきの 調子乗り過ぎだったかな

CONTENT: お前のこと ちゃんと見てるからな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, kid. I see you, okay?

CONTENT: 完全に目を付けられてるー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's watching me!

CONTENT: ほら 後藤さん 写真撮りましょう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vamos a tomarnos la foto, Goto.

CONTENT: 終わった...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's over.

CONTENT: 店長
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Manager.

CONTENT: 本当は最初から あの子たち 出す気だったんでしょう?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pensabas dejarlas tocar desde el principio, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Admit it. You liked them from the start.

CONTENT: だって ライブスケジュール　ずっと1枠 空けてたじゃないですか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hace tiempo que hay un hueco en el programa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: C'mon, you've been keeping a window open in the concert schedule for them.

CONTENT: なんで あんな意地悪を?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why tease them like that?

CONTENT: 意地悪とかじゃないから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wasn't teasing.

CONTENT: 納得できなかったら 出す気はなかったよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si no me convencían, no iban a tocar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I just didn't want to put them on until they were ready.

CONTENT: でも まだ粗削りだけど なんか感じるものはあるし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero, aunque aún tienen mucho por pulir, lograron llegarme al alma.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But while they're still rough around the edges, I think they've got something.

CONTENT: 身内のあたしが厳しくして　バンドを育ててあげたほうが いいじゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es mejor que las eduque estrictamente alguien que conocen.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: As her sister, I need to be hard on her to make sure her band grows.

CONTENT: フフッ こういうのって シスコンっていうんですっけ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is this what they call a sister complex?

CONTENT: それ以上しゃべったら クビな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sigue con eso y te despido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: One more word about that, and you're fired.

CONTENT: はーい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right.

CONTENT: よーし じゃあライブまで 更に頑張って　バンドレベル 上げてこー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Sigamos esforzándonos para subir de nivel como banda!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay! Let's work even harder to level up our band in the lead-up to the concert!

CONTENT: おーっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right!

CONTENT: ぼっち 新曲の歌詞 よろしく
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi, I'm looking forward to the new lyrics.

CONTENT: は... はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right!

CONTENT: どんどん 楽しくなってきたね 後藤さん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esto es cada vez más divertido, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Isn't this getting exciting, Gotoh-san?!

CONTENT: は... はい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yes!

CONTENT: そ... そうだ! 終わってなんてない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es verdad, no es mi fin.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Th-That's right! It's not over at all!

CONTENT: むしろ 俺たち結束バンドの 冒険は これからだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Kessoku Band aún tiene muchas aventuras por delante.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In fact, Kessoku Band's journey is just getting started!

CONTENT: じゃあ チケットノルマ 1500円を20枚だから　1人5枚ずつで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El mínimo son 20 entradas de 1 500, así que... son cinco por persona.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now, since the ticket quota is twenty at 1,500 yen each, that means we each sell five!

CONTENT: ノルマ5枚?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Five-ticket quota...

CONTENT: ノルマ5枚ー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Five-ticket quota?!

CONTENT: 5枚ですね 了解です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Five tickets, right? Got it!

CONTENT: ノルマ5枚!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Five-ticket quota?!

CONTENT: 父
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Father...

CONTENT: 娘がロック史に名を刻むのかー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mi hija será una leyenda del rock.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My daughter's inscribing her name into rock history...

CONTENT: 母
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mother...

CONTENT: お赤飯 炊こう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll cook some red rice!

CONTENT: 妹
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sister...

CONTENT: お姉ちゃん すごーい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're awesome, Sis!

CONTENT: 犬
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Dog...

CONTENT: ワン!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Woof!

CONTENT: 父 母 妹 犬　父 母 妹 犬 父 母 妹 犬　父 母 妹 犬!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Papá. Mamá. Mi hermana. El perro.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Father, mother, sister, dog! Father, mother, sister, dog! Father, mother, sister, dog! Father, mother, sister, dog!

CONTENT: い... いいい... 1枚余る!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I... I h-have one left over!

CONTENT: 後藤さん 泣くほど うれしいのね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotoh-san is so happy, she's crying!

CONTENT: 絶対 みんなで いいライブにしないとね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tenemos que dar un gran concierto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We have to put on a great concert together!

CONTENT: うむ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah.

CONTENT: こ... 今度こそ 完全に終わった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esta vez sí que será mi fin.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-It's really over this time.
